events.blurb: Ireland devalued as an independent Kingdom
events.description: Through Laudabiliter, the pope declared Ireland to be a feudal provice of the Holy See, but under the temporal rule of the monarch of England under the title "Lord of Ireland."
events.source:
[Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/).
"[Crown of Ireland Act 1542](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crown_of_Ireland_Act_1542)"
Last Edited: 2023-08-12. Last Viewed: 2023-12-07.

events.blurb: Henry VIII of England declared King of Ireland.
events.description:
This was done via the Crown of Ireland Act of 1542, 
passed by the Irish Parliament.  This was probably
done to deal with Henry's heresy.  However, it would later 
be recognized by Catholic leaders (including the Church) when
Mary came to the throne.  There would never again be a
*fully* independent Irish monarch.
events.source:
[Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/).
"[Crown of Ireland Act 1542](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crown_of_Ireland_Act_1542)"
Last Edited: 2023-08-12. Last Viewed: 2023-12-07.

events.description: An Irish Free State is created a self governing state still subject to and part of the British Empire.  The King of England remains head of state.

This act completes the slow errosion of English rule started in 1921. 
It made no attempt to address Northern Ireland, which had remained united to England in 1921.
events.source:
* [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/).
  "[The Republic of Ireland Act 1948](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Republic_of_Ireland_Act_1948)"
  Last Edited: 2023-08-29. Last Viewed: 2023-12-07.
* [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/).
  "[Anglo-Irish Treaty](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anglo-Irish_Treaty)"
  Last Edited: 2023-12-07. Last Viewed: 2023-12-07.
